page.title: 20Credits
page.content: The{information on this block}has been collected and entered by{First {Year pupils at Danesfield C.E Middle {School}(The First Year being 9 & 10 years old) They have been helped by the warm cooperation of many people in the area. Mr Gibbons at Staple Farm entertained children on two separate occasions. Mr Toogood the Blacksmith broke off his mornings work to talk to children about his work. Mrs Walmsely at the Hospital and Mrs Pooley at the Library were equally generous with their time. {Mums and Dads}helped with {transporting children}around to far corners of the block. And in the case of Mrs Snell did a lot of homework writing notes about the Doniford Holiday Village.
